*nucleus*:
  * Autonomic Nuclei

   * *SSL*: [BrainRegionAVA_HM_SAL_SSL Superior Salivatory Nucleus,AVA.HM.SAL.SSL] - facilitate respiration - produce thiker saliva (preganglionic parasympathetic nucleus; project to submaxillary (submandibular) ganglion to submandibular/sublingual gland; to sphenopalatine ganglion to superior maxillary nerve as vasodilator and secretory fibers to the mucous membrane of the nose, soft palate, tonsils, uvula, roof of the mouth, upper lips and gums, parotid and orbital glands); TRACTS={}

   * *SPS*: [BrainRegionAVA_SC_IZ_SPS Sacral Parasympathetic Nucleus,AVA.SC.IZ.SPS] - parasympathetic impulses pass via postganglionic fibers to the urinary bladder, erectile tissues, and the smooth muscles and glands in the colon and rectum (from Lamina VII, visceral parasympathetic); TRACTS={}
   * *EWN*: [BrainRegionVBA_MM_EWN Edinger-Westphal Nucleus,VBA.MM.EWN] - Change Eye Pupil (Parasympathetic nucleus, parvocellular extention of OCN); TRACTS={}
   * *CSC*: [BrainRegionVBA_SC_IZ_CSC Ciliospinal Center,VBA.SC.IZ.CSC] - Control of iris dilator muscle (Budge's Center, intermediolateral cell column); TRACTS={}

   * *SOL*: [BrainRegionLPC_HM_SOL Solitary Nucleus,LPC.HM.SOL] - Carry taste buds, thoracic and abdominal viscera (c.n. VII, IX, X); TRACTS={spinosolitary tract}
   * *CONV*: [BrainRegionLPC_HM_VCOCH Ventral Cochlear Nucleus,LPC.HM.VCOCH] - determine direction sound came from, time-sensitive localization; TRACTS={}

   * *HYG*: [BrainRegionLPC_HM_HYG Hypoglossal Motor Nucleus,LPC.HM.HYG] - Control of tongue; TRACTS={corticobulbar tract}

   * *TRH*: [BrainRegionLPC_MM_TRH Trochlear Nucleus,LPC.MM.TRH] - Control superior oblique muscles of eyes (Muscle nucleus, change eye direction); TRACTS={}

   * *IMM*: [BrainRegionAVA_SC_IZ_IMM Intermediomedial Nucleus,AVA.SC.IZ.IMM] - Visceral sensory (ventral spinocerebellar tract); TRACTS={spinomedulloreticular tract; spinopontoreticular tract; ventral spinocerebellar tract}
   * *CBN*: [BrainRegionBMA_SC_IZ_CBS Centrobasalis Nucleus,BMA.SC.IZ.CBS] - Unconscious proprioception to CR (Upper extremity, relay motor feedback to CR, major site of termination for dorsal root fibers); TRACTS={}
   * *CCN*: [BrainRegionBMA_SC_IZ_CCV Central Cervical Nucleus,BMA.SC.IZ.CCV] - Coordinate voluntary movements, maintain balance, and learn motor skills (Receive neck and vestibular input and project to CR and vestibular nuclei); TRACTS={rostral spinocerebellar tract; spinoolivary tract; spinovestibular tract}
   * *LCN*: [BrainRegionBMA_SC_LH_LCV Lateral Cervical Nucleus,BMA.SC.LH.LCV] - Relay Low-threshold Mechanoreceptors to CR (From Lamina V); TRACTS={spinocervical tract}
   * *CLN*: [BrainRegionBMA_SC_PH_CL Clarke Nucleus,BMA.SC.PH.CL] - Unconscious Proprioception (To CR); TRACTS={dorsal spinocerebellar tract}
   * *ACN*: [BrainRegionLPC_HM_ACU Accessory Cuneate Nucleus,LPC.HM.ACU] - receives input from cervical spinal nerves and transmits that information to cerebellum (upper extremity equivalent of Clarke's column); TRACTS={cuneocerebellar tract}
   * *CUN*: [BrainRegionLPC_HM_CU Cuneate Nucleus,LPC.HM.CU] - Carry fine touch and proprioceptive information from upper body; TRACTS={fasciculus cuneatus tract; tract of Lissauer}
   * *GRN*: [BrainRegionLPC_HM_GR Gracile Nucleus,LPC.HM.GR] - Carry epicritic, kinesthetic, and conscious proprioceptive information from lower body; TRACTS={fasciculus gracilis tract; tract of Lissauer}

   * *ONN*: [BrainRegionAVA_SC_VH_ONF Onuf's Nucleus,AVA.SC.VH.ONF] - Maintenance of urination and defecation, muscular contraction during orgasm (From Barrington's Nucleus); TRACTS={}
   * *PHN*: [BrainRegionLPC_SC_VH_PHR Phrenic Nucleus,LPC.SC.VH.PHR] - Innervation of diaphragm (Projections from Nucleus Solitarius); TRACTS={}
   * *PMN*: [BrainRegionLPC_SC_VH_PM Posteromedial Nucleus,LPC.SC.VH.PM] - Innervation of trunk muscles (Upper and lower); TRACTS={lateral corticospinal tract; rubrospinal tract}
   * *VMN*: [BrainRegionLPC_SC_VH_VM Ventromedial Nucleus,LPC.SC.VH.VM] - Innervation of trunk muscles (Upper and lower); TRACTS={anterior corticospinal tract}
  * Spinal Pain and Temperature
   * *DCN*: [BrainRegionAVA_SC_CC_DCN Dorsal Commisural Nucleus,AVA.SC.CC.DCN] - Relay of sensory information from pelvic viscera (Includes nociception); TRACTS={}
   * *LSN*: [BrainRegionBMA_SC_LH_LSN Lateral Spinal Nucleus,BMA.SC.LH.LSN] - Integrate autonomic and homeostatic functions (Projects to HT and lateral globus pallidus; integrative nucleus for autonomic and homeostatic functions, and related motivational and affective responses to autonomic function); TRACTS={spinohypothalamic tract; spinosolitary tract; tract of Lissauer}
   * *NPR*: [BrainRegionBMA_SC_PH_NP Proprius Nucleus,BMA.SC.PH.NP] - Relay light touch, pain and temperature information (With Clarke's Nucleus sensing fine touch and proprioception); TRACTS={spinocervical tract; spinoolivary tract; spinotectal tract}
   * *LMG*: [BrainRegionLPC_SC_PH_LMG Lower Marginal Nucleus,LPC.SC.PH.LMG] - Relay information related to pain and temperature sensation - T7-T12,L1-L5,S1-S5,CX; TRACTS={lateral spinothalamic tract; spinomesencephalic tract; tract of Lissauer}
   * *LSG*: [BrainRegionLPC_SC_PH_LSG Lower Substantia Gelatinosa,LPC.SC.PH.LSG] - Relay for C-fibers of slowly conducting, poorly localized pain sensation - T7-T12,L1-L5,S1-S5,CX; TRACTS={anterior spinothalamic tract; lateral spinothalamic tract}
   * *UMG*: [BrainRegionLPC_SC_PH_UMG Upper Marginal Nucleus,LPC.SC.PH.UMG] - Relay information related to pain and temperature sensation - C1-C8,T1-T6; TRACTS={lateral spinothalamic tract; spinomesencephalic tract; tract of Lissauer}
   * *USG*: [BrainRegionLPC_SC_PH_USG Upper Substantia Gelatinosa,LPC.SC.PH.USG] - Relay for C-fibers of slowly conducting, poorly localized pain sensation - C1-C8,T1-T6; TRACTS={anterior spinothalamic tract; lateral spinothalamic tract}
